Class BrowseController

                          org.webcurator.ui.tools.controller.BrowseController
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
public class BrowseController
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractCommandController

The BrowseController is responsible for handling the Browse Quality Review tool. This controller is responsible for reading the requested resource from the DigitalAssetStore and performing any replacements that have been registered with the BrowseHelper through the Spring configuration.

Author:
bbeaumont

Method Detail

setBrowseHelper

public void setBrowseHelper(BrowseHelper browseHelper)
Sets the BrowseHelper for the controller. This is primarily called from the Spring configuration.

Parameters:
browseHelper - The browseHelper that the controller should use.

setQualityReviewFacade

public void setQualityReviewFacade(QualityReviewFacade qualityReviewFacade)
Sets the QualityReviewFacade for the controller. The facade is set by the Spring configuration.

Parameters:
qualityReviewFacade - The facade the controller should use.
